--- title: OUScope keywords: fastai sidebar: home_sidebar summary: "The `ouscope` is a library providing python interface to the Open University Autonomous Robotic Telescope facility at telescope.org" description: "The `ouscope` is a library providing python interface to the Open University Autonomous Robotic Telescope facility at telescope.org" nb_path: "index.ipynb" ---
{% raw %}
{% endraw %}

The library provides access and control for the telescope. The functions help with job submission, image retrival and initial analysis. For naw this is aimed at variable star observations, but there is nothing prohibiting additional modules intended for different fields (e.g. astrometry).

Install

pip install ouscope

How to use

Not ready yet so you cannot really use it now.
